translations.translation: On that Day, the Occurrence will occur
On that Day will come what is to come.
on that Day shall that indubitable event come to pass;
On that day, the inevitable event will take place
So that is the day when the forthcoming event will occur.
Then on that Day shall the Event occur.
On that day shall the great event come to pass,
then, on that day, the Terror shall come to pass,
Then, on that day will the Event befall.
on that Day the Great Event will come to pass.
Then on that Day shall happen the Event.
then, on that day, will the Imminent [Hour] befall
On that Day shall the (Great) Event come to pass.
Then on that Day shall the (Great) Event befall,
on that Day, the Event occurs.
On that Day, the Event will come to pass.
Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
[69:15] then, on that day, the [imminent] Event will come to pass, the Resurrection will take place,
Then, on that day) when the earth and the mountains are lifted up (will the Event befall) the Day of 688 Judgement will happen.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَيَوْمَئِذٍ } أي: حين وقوع هذه الحالة الهائلة { وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ } [الحاقة: 15] وقامت القيامة الكبرى
 والطامة العظمى

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فيومئذٍ } 
 فحينئذ { وقعت الواقعةُ } أي: قامت القيامة بعدها
